programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent

While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. He's a marketing director and she's a doctor so she's often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vipin's family of four are in the market to purchase their own dream home in the Greater Toronto Area.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man tests officers' patience. A woman tries to deceive police with multiple identities. A one-legged biker shows off his balancing skills to officers.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an honest offender turns himself in. Officers arrest an underage woman who admits to driving under the influence. A woman is taken into custody after harming herself with a pair of scissors

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. A couple’s wedding plans are ruined after officers find their stash of meth, and an arrest leaves an elderly gentleman singing the blues after being processed for a possession charge.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought into the detention center hogtied. A disruptive teen is sent to a holding cell. Casino valets tip the authorities about an intoxicated woman leaving behind the wheel.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Over the course of a single shift, officers are forced to go toe to toe with a hotheaded inmate refusing to change cells without a fight and then must deal with the whims of a homeless man who demands room service and an upgraded jail cell.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate becomes aggressive during a routine pat down. A confused senior citizen thinks the detention center is the site of a poetry slam, and two girlfriends come to blows while gambling.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process. A man claims to be part of the “international police”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Sarasota, FL officers place a hostile former Marine in isolation. In Portland, OR officers take a man into custody for joyriding in a stolen car. In Las Vegas, NV a jailed man is more concerned about the condition of his car rather than the people involved in the accident that was hospitalized.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Boisterous inmates are placed in restraints after initiating several verbal altercations. A woman struggles with substance abuse following the death of her fianc̩, and two young escorts discuss their "observing" strategy when casino hopping.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman stalking David Copperfield is arrested. An inebriated inmate voices her displeasure with the guards, and a man nabbed for driving under the influence of prescription drugs howls for his dog.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Tempers flare up when two agitated inmates share a cell. An intoxicated woman gives officers a hard time in booking, and a hustler facing DUI charges wants to change his ways.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An intoxicated man thinks the doctors are CIA agents. A homeless karate practitioner's actions land him in an isolated cell, and a Canadian man with no pants wants to arm wrestle.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate fails to impress the staff with his witticisms. A woman boasts about excelling at her DUI field test, and a man learns his wreckless driving has resulted in the death of a man.

programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A high-priced escort is accused of skipping out on her limo tab. A ladies' man directs foul language at the jail nurse, and a seasoned prostitute considers getting into the sex-toy business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Needles are found on one woman while a stun gun is discovered on another. A DUI test stirs up bad memories for a man driving while intoxicated, and a convicted murderer becomes violent.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers struggle with an angry man after he kicks out a patrol car window. A relationship ends when a woman takes a bite out of her boyfriend. An upset wife stabs her husband and he ends up in handcuffs. A woman is happy to celebrate her birthday by going to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 One Too Many Times
programme.desc: A man learns it’s never a good idea to light up a joint next to an active crime scene. An officer encourages a young drug addicted couple to seek treatment. Luck runs out for a tutu-wearing prostitute, and officers pick up an at-risk kid for their 93rd time.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A combative man is placed in a side cell. A transgender woman shares her story. A wild driver is placed in custody, and an intoxicated man is arrested for assault.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an upset inmate damages the door on a patrol car. In Portland, OR a man over-estimates the legal consequences of his actions. In Tacoma, WA a couple charged with domestic violence denies getting physical even though there’s blood in the woman’s hair.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A disorderly man shouts to the heavens and asks for divine intervention. Twin brothers are arrested after a fray with police. A man in women’s clothing is booked after harassing passengers on a bus.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge. In Sarasota, FL a drunk man falls off his bike and purports to have been hit by a car. In Las Vegas, LV a daring inmate attempts to make a break for it while the supervising officers attend to a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A violent ruckus ensues after a man is placed in jail. Secret prison communication methods are explored and examined. Later, deputies cautiously extract a disruptive man while his wife is held nearby.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Melee in the Cell
programme.desc: A brawl breaks out between inmates during a routine jail breakfast. An inmate alters their uniform in provocative and outlandish ways. Concerns abound as one-man issues violent threats at deputies.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested during a dangerous drug deal struggles to face jail time. Tempers flare when a man makes threats against the arresting officers. Marijuana falls out of a man’s pockets during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After falling down a flight of stairs while drunk, a young man is amazed he is in jail for refusing to go to the hospital. A correction officer tries to explain to a young man why carrying a gun-shaped knife is not a good idea. An expectant father is arrested after a gin-fueled rampage at his parent's house and misses the birth of his first child. A woman arrested for selling fake designer purses as real ones says she didn’t know it was a crime.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate refuses to be handcuffed while officers seek to search his cell for contraband. A man tells deputies he is known as “Baby Boy” amongst the ladies. Fights erupt during prison phone time.

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Deputies assist arresting officers by removing an angry man from their patrol car. Violent outbursts plague an arrest. One woman struggles with bail. Three drunk men become wildly emotional.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man claims royal lineage during a combative booking process. After resisting officers and harboring a vicious animal, a man is arrested. Later, intoxicated individuals create havoc for officers.

programme.title: Jail

programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate is subdued for refusing to follow commands. A woman accused of running out on a dinner bill has her jewelry sawed off in jail. After issuing criminal terrorist threats, a man is jailed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police follow a car after it leaves a drug house. A police officer in Las Vegas goes undercover posing as a ‘john.’ Officers give chase when they observe a car making an illegal U-Turn.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A traffic stop becomes dangerous when the suspect takes off on the interstate. Officers find a large bag of drugs in a man’s pants. Officers respond to a dispute at a familiar location.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police arrest a bicycling dealer and his client. Police respond to a call of an unhinged rottweiler. Officers arrest an inebriated man after they spot him grabbing a female bystander.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect goes out to get his haircut and winds up in jail. Officers try to piece together a puzzling street fight between a boxer and his confused friend. Cops give a suspect every chance to admit to his obvious crime.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Police are in a high-speed chase with a car missing a tire. Police respond when a tow truck driver is assaulted by an apartment manager. Police are called when a relative attacks a woman’s husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E16 Mean Girls Times Two
programme.desc: Deputies are forced to tase a man after pursuing him into a field. A driver plays dumb when asked about the revolver under his car seat. Officers respond to two teenage girls in a fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A group of suspects race a stolen SUV through a residential neighborhood. A drunk man has a kitchen knife and a listening problem. Two usual suspects are going back to jail for their latest escapades.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A remorseful woman is arrested for lewd conduct during Mardi Gras. Officers are dispatched into the busy streets of New Orleans during the super bowl. Officers investigates a theft at a local store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E01 UC Drug Sting I
programme.desc: A man with a suspended license flees a routine traffic stop on foot. Deputies respond to a battered woman after receiving a 911 hang up call. A sting operation nets a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Three men are apprehended for solicitation. Officers respond to a domestic violence call at an apartment complex. An officer discovers a teenager is dating an older man.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E07 No Shirt, Lots of Service
programme.desc: When approached by police, a suspect decides to take his shirt off and taunt the officers. Twin sisters ask for help when their third sister is threated by her boyfriend. An intoxicated suspect crashes his wife’s car into a light pole.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E26 Copy of Leave her Alone
programme.desc: A shots fired investigation results in a foot pursuit and the recovery of a discarded firearm. An officer intervenes in a family dispute involving a daughter, boyfriend and $9,000 in warrants. Three women are questioned in connection to a suspicious vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E01 He's the Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: A man wanted for unpaid child support hides from deputies. Officers respond to a sexual predator following a minor. A man with a checkered driving record crashes his car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed chase ends when the suspect plays chicken with a concrete pole. An emotional man just wants the cops to give him a little kiss. A melee breaks out when a woman seizes her beau's cell phone.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Two cousins fight over a five dollar debt. Police arrest a man for domestic violence. A taxi cab driver is robbed and shot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A family with kids is taken on a high speed car chase. A intoxicated suspect tries to jump a fence while protesting that he’s not trying to run away. A jealous boyfriend terrorizes his girlfriend and her parents.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man throws out his narcotics during a foot-chase with police. A woman is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Officers call for back-up after a woman is held at knife-point.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer shows up as Coco the Clown in an undercover sting. The Vice unit conducts a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspected “johns.”

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E17 Rocks in my Socks
programme.desc: Deputies discover a purse and a sock containing paraphernalia during an arrest. Deputies pursue an intoxicated motorcyclist. A woman is suspected of stealing a cake.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A woman stuffs drugs into her under garments. A mother attacks her daughter because she got married in Vegas. Officers are called when a woman is accused of stalking her friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E18 Wrong Place, Wrong Time
programme.desc: A man takes off from officers when they roll up on a notorious hotspot for dealers. Cops surprise a jaywalker when they find some suspicious items in his supposedly borrowed jacket. A woman takes the heat for her beau when meth is found in their car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E16 We Run the Show
programme.desc: A stealthy robbery suspect leads officers on a chase through backyards. After dropping a bag of meth, a man swears he’s only seen the drug on TV. A doped-up domestic violence suspect tries to claim self-defense.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An out-of-control woman needs to be subdued after an arrest. Deputies spot an erratic driver who appears to be under the influence. A car is seen driving backwards on a one-way street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E32 Follow Me to the River
programme.desc: A deputy jumps into a waterway to arrest a fleeing suspect. Officers respond to roommates in an argument. Officers are called after a group of women are attacked.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E04 No Respect these Days
programme.desc: A combative man at a fast food restaurant claims his phone was stolen. Multiple illegal items are found on a man parked on the side of the road. An intoxicated man throws an 83-year-old’s walker.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer assists a routine traffic stop which results in a DUI arrest. A drug related arrest is made in a high crime area. A man with a revoked driver’s license is placed under arrest and a prostitute is let go with a warning.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A vehicular pursuit in Florida comes to a head when the driver careens into a ditch. An officer responds to a troubling domestic call. An intoxicated brawler is taken into custody.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called to a burglary at a warehouse housing expensive items. Police are called to the scene of a threatening man with a knife. Officers thwart an attempted suicide during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E06 Sharp Knives and Dirty Donuts
programme.desc: A customer pulls out a knife when asked to leave the store. A man doing donuts in a motel parking lot is questioned about a love triangle. Officers are flagged down by a man who was shot at while riding his bike.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A stolen vehicle pursuit ends in a take down and recovery of additional evidence. A store employee flags down an officer who steps in to make a theft related arrest. An officer is accompanied by several units in pursuit of a stolen vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E15 All The World's Our Bedroom
programme.desc: Officers are called to remove a man sleeping in a parking spot at Wal-Mart. A free-spirited couple takes their relationship to their front lawn. A resident brings a knife to a meeting with his building property manager.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man with a knife tries to evade police by hiding in bushes. Vice Unit Officers conduct a prostitution sting. When Officers are shot at during a pursuit, the woman claims it was flashes from a camera.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers intervene when an estranged husband kicks his ex-wife’s boyfriend’s car. A man claims someone gave him the car he is driving. A woman claims the pills in her purse are not hers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E20 Now It's Lawn Furniture
programme.desc: A traffic stop over a broken brake light turns into a foot chase. A man handles bad news by throwing his furniture out of the window. A vehicle pursuit ends with a K-9 unit’s help.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies chase a man who flees a routine traffic stop. Deputies find drugs on a man who gives them an expired license. Officers respond to a man attacking several patrons in a bar.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A cyclist gets booked for trying to split when officers pull him over for a traffic violation. Two brothers struggle to explain why they took off in their truck when they saw the cops. A man takes a swing at his sister because she refuses to mow the lawn.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A foot chase gets complicated when the suspect proves he’s not in good health. A suspect believes he doesn’t need to follow the rules of the road. A man calls the police on his ex-girlfriend when she makes a moving mistake.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. The passenger of a vehicle is arrested for possession. Police are given a classic "I'm holding it for a friend" excuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers investigate two vehicles involved in an accident. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a knife. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a gun at a convenience store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A police chase becomes more dangerous when the hood of a stolen vehicle flips open. A purse snatcher denies robbing a woman. A limping man with a knee injury denies crashing his car into a tree.

programme.desc: Wszyscy na pokład ekspresu edukacyjnego! Ted to pociąg, który uczy dzieci o kolorach, zwierzętach, owocach, warzywach i nie tylko.

programme.title: Carl the Super Truck
programme.desc: Carl Super Truck i jego transformacje na ratunek! Gdy Samochodzikowo potrzebuje pomocy, ten superbohater wkracza do akcji.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Billdozer powraca, podobnie jak jego przyjaciele! Poznajmy całą ekipę i dowiedzmy się, czego są hybrydami.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: G-Crane jest tak kolorowy jak zawsze, a jego zadaniem jest odnalezienie jak największej liczby uśmiechniętych buziek ukrytych w dżungli.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Wszędzie dookoła kryją się skarby! Zobaczmy, ile klejnotów i kształtów możemy znaleźć na plaży z Trucktle.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Krusty świetnie się bawi, ucząc nas wszystkich kolorów na plaży, z kilkoma bardzo eleganckimi kapeluszami!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Wheelephant i Bulldozer na zmianę grają w grę "Tipper, Picker, Overs", jednocześnie ucząc się liczb, kolorów i kształtów.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Krusty bawi się w detektywa i odkrywa tajemnicę ukrytych liczb. Pod wodospadem, za krzakami, nie ma kamienia na kamieniu!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Nasi przyjaciele z AnimaCars uwielbiają być aktywni. Poznajmy różne sporty i sposoby na utrzymanie dobrej kondycji i zdrowia!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Jest piękny dzień; chodźmy na plażę i uczmy się kształtów z Trackodile i Krusty, bawiąc się w słońcu!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Dumptrucks i Wheelephant uwielbiają koszykówkę i uczą się wszystkich kolorów różnych drużyn NBA podczas strzelania do kosza.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Znajdowanie kolorów to świetna zabawa! Torch i Billdozer próbują znaleźć jak najwięcej czerwonych przedmiotów podczas spaceru po łące.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Dumptrucks ma misję odnalezienia jak największej liczby kształtów podczas przejażdżki przez dżunglę.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Wheelephant uwielbia kręgle prawie tak bardzo, jak kocha liczby; co za zabawny sposób na naukę liczenia!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Billdozer uczy się radości z liczb z pomocą swojego przyjaciela Meagle'a, pomagając mu załadować ładunek!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Wheelephant i G-Crane na zmianę wrzucają popcorn do wiaderka, ucząc się przy tym liczb. Policzmy i zobaczmy, kto wygra!

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Dołącz do Krusty'ego, aby uczyć się alfabetu i znajdować przedmioty zaczynające się na litery, które znajdzie w pobliżu.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Dołączmy do G-Crane'a w zabawie w chowanego i policzmy, ilu przyjaciół znajdzie w sadzie.

programme.title: Learning with AnimaCars
programme.desc: Meagle wyrusza na poszukiwanie rzadkiego kwiatu w kropki w dżungli. Policzmy, ile ich znajdzie.

programme.desc: Billdozer powraca, podobnie jak jego przyjaciele! Poznajmy całą ekipę i dowiedzmy się, czego są hybrydami.

programme.desc: They all had 1 massive song, then never skirted the UK Top 20 singles chart again! Here are 70 acts from every year of the 70s, in order, who all achieved their 15 minutes of fame.

programme.title: Bruno's Can You Believe It?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bruno's Can You Believe It?!
programme.desc: Incredible facts & amazing trivia about some of the decade's most famous songs & videos! This is 2 hours of Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes asking 'Can You Believe It?!'

programme.title: 1970s Glastonbury Headliners!
programme.desc: Since the first festival in 1970, there were only another 2 in the decade - in 1971 & 1979. But these were the acts that headlined & performed, and one that didn't!

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: 50 Summer Sizzlers! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 50 of the very best feel-good summer hits. Each was a Top 10 smash across June, July & August in the '70s - on the beach, on your transistor radio, and at the big Radio 1 Roadshow!

programme.title: 70s School Disco!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Simon Bates 70s Pop Reloaded!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates 70s Pop Reloaded!
programme.desc: The ever-smooth Simes dusts off his flares, fires up the lava lamp & takes you on a psychedelic spin through the 70s. Side effects may include sudden urges to perm your hair!

programme.title: 70s School Disco!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: 70s Stars - But Who Is The Oldest?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 70s Stars - But Who Is The Oldest?
programme.desc: It's music's very own over-70s club, packed with superstars including Barry Gibb, Debbie Harry, and Bryan Ferry. Buy they're all youngsters next to the select bunch aged 80-plus!

programme.title: Saturday Night's Alright!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Did They Really Do That? Top 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Did They Really Do That? Top 30
programme.desc: 30 fabulously great, but awful, chart hits & videos - all with that certain cringe factor attached. Did they really do that? They certainly did!

programme.title: Party Hits '76! with Dave Bartram
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Party Hits '76! with Dave Bartram
programme.desc: Every song comes from that vintage year when the sun shone all summer & Dave's band Showaddywaddy had their big number 1. Queen, Leo Sayer, Abba & Smokie also kept the hits coming.

programme.title: In The Summertime!
programme.desc: Feelgood sunshine hits from a colourful decade - the 1970s! Flares & mini-skirts at the ready?

programme.title: David Bowie in the 70s & 80s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 David Bowie in the 70s & 80s
programme.desc: 2 hours of his classic videos - from Space Oddity to Absolute Beginners.

programme.title: Clare Grogan's Teenage Kicks!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Clare Grogan's Teenage Kicks!
programme.desc: The 5 years from '77 to '81 was possibly the most exciting & vibrant time to be a teenager & Clare Grogan was there - buying the records, seeing the bands & wearing the t-shirts!

programme.title: Summer Loving!
programme.desc: Non-stop summer love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.desc: Keyboards, crooners & cabaret - mum & dad would have bored you senseless on their 8-track in the car, but now these quality tunes just sound class! 30 class acts - and their songs.

programme.title: Pizza Party on the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up pizzas including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie, and a French Bread Pizza.

programme.title: Perfectly Prepared Steaks
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, & grill up the biggest and best steaks out there.

programme.title: Sunday Vietnamese Brisket with Noodles
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde celebrates Sunday with Vietnamese Brisket, Swordfish Summer Rolls, and Frosty Soju Floats.

programme.title: 4th of July Remixed
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale grills up his 4th of July favorites, like galbi smash double cheeseburgers and char sui bbq ribs.

programme.title: Restaurant-Style Whole Roast Fish
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale grills to impress with a fancy-looking yet easy-to-make whole roasted fish with watermelon salad.

programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Derrell Smith joins Dale Talde as they grill up a Salmon Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even a frozen treat.

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks off summer with a burger blowout featuring Brisket, Shrimp, and Lamb Burgers.

programme.title: Kabobs and Skewers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale grills up a Mediterranean-inspired feast of beef and shrimp kabobs with tomatoes and pita.

programme.title: It's Taco Time
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale takes on tacos with a showstopping riff on al pastor: lemongrass and guajillo pork with pineapple.

programme.title: Springtime
programme.desc: Spring is in the air and Chef Derrell makes lamb shanks with lemon couscous, a savory lamb curry and gyros.

programme.title: Sunday Supper
programme.desc: Sunday Supper is served as Chef Derrell makes his signature meatballs and adds them into soup and a tasty sub.

programme.title: Guys' Night Out
programme.desc: Chef Derrell shares his best Guys’ Night Out stories and favorite meal of lemon pepper wings and loaded fries.

programme.title: Ultimate Taco Tuesday
programme.desc: Taco Tuesday is fun Chef Derrell’s way with pernil tacos, mexican street corn, empanadas, and flambe maduros.

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Chef Derrell shares his favorite Mother’s Day meal of shrimp and grits, ceviche and a fancy biscuit sandwich.

programme.title: Break Up Meal
programme.desc: Chef Derrell serves up comfort and caters to the broken-hearted with lobster mac n’ cheese and tomato bisque.

programme.title: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Chef Derrell is serving a Low-Country Boil with all the fixings and berry skillet cobbler to kick-off Summer.

programme.title: Juneteenth
programme.desc: Chef Derrell puts the “soul” in Soul Food as he makes BBQ ribs, collard greens and potato salad.

programme.title: Thankful For Everything
programme.desc: Chef Derrell makes his Thanksgiving meal of herb cornish hens, stuffing and tostones with cranberry sauce.

programme.title: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Fire up the grill, turn up the music and soak up the summer sun with these quintessential cookout recipes.

programme.title: Saved By The Bowl
programme.desc: Spare your weekly spending allowance by recreating your favorite takeout bowls at home.

programme.title: But First, Brunch
programme.desc: Bring your loved ones together over a celebratory brunch spread made with love.

programme.title: Struggle Splurge
programme.desc: Treat yourself to dinner struggle style: easy enough for a weeknight yet as elegant as a restaurant special.

programme.title: Cubanos, Empanadas, & Smoked Beef Rib in Miami
programme.desc: Frankie goes to Miami to sample smoked beef rib, spinach empanadas, and a legendary Cubano sandwich.

programme.title: Quail, Alligator Sausage, & Gumbo in New Orleans
programme.desc: Frankie stops by New Orleans to chow down on lacquered quail, a beast of a Po Boy, and Creole Beef Daube.

programme.title: Pho, Poke, & Pig in O’ahu
programme.desc: Frankie explores O’ahu island to get nourished from fresh tuna poke, heartfelt Pho, and hand-pounded poi.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls & Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza tries San Antonio’s best brunch, epic puffy tacos, colorful conchitas, & BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Game Day
programme.desc: Frankie throws a game day party for under $25 and shows us how to prep some fan-favorite finger foods.

programme.title: Winter is Here
programme.desc: It’s the dead of winter in Frankie’s kitchen, which means it’s that time for hearty, delicious, warming meals.

programme.title: Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Frankie prepares a Valentine’s Day dinner for under $15 with a bistro-style theme to up the romance.

programme.title: Beans Beans Beans
programme.desc: Frankie will teach the basics of preparing beans from scratch while making super tasty recipes.

programme.title: Rent Week
programme.desc: It's rent week. Frankie teaches us how to better prepare for this time of the month and cooks up go-to meals.

programme.title: Mushroom Mania
programme.desc: Learn how to make some inventive, flavorful mushroom dishes that might trip you out on their awesomeness.

programme.title: No Kitchen No Problem
programme.desc: Frankie shows us easy and inventive “no-kitchen” hacks for delicious struggly meals. No Kitchen? No problem.

programme.title: Spring Fling
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to cook with mother nature, spring-style.

programme.title: Spice Is Nice
programme.desc: Frankie shows us how to make a variety of homemade spice blends and tackles a challenge with a monster guest!

programme.title: Root-to-Stem
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to use whole vegetables, from root-to-stem: less waste, more food, and more nutrition.

programme.title: Warm + Cozy Winter
programme.desc: Frankie gets cozy with recipes that bring warmth, flavor and joy to the kitchen on the coldest winter days.

programme.title: Eggscellent Techniques
programme.desc: Learn Frankie’s techniques and tricks for making your favorite egg dishes just the way you like them.

programme.title: Vintage
programme.desc: Frankie shows us that vintage doesn’t have to break the bank with these classic, oldie-but-goodie recipes.

programme.title: Struggle Soup
programme.desc: Follow Frankie’s blueprints for building a hit soup that will have you returning for seconds all year round.
